plugins.name: wicked-mem
plugins.description: Structured memory with signal-based recall. Unlike built-in memory, wicked-mem categorizes memories by type (episodic, decision, procedural, preference), decays stale memories automatically, and only injects context when your question signals need it — preventing context bloat.

plugins.name: wicked-search
plugins.description: Unified code and document search with Symbol Graph, graph traversal, hotspot detection, and multi-project isolation. Multi-ORM data lineage, cross-layer linking, blast radius analysis, symbol enrichment, and wicked-cache integration.

plugins.name: wicked-patch
plugins.description: Language-agnostic code generation and change propagation using symbol graphs. 12 generators (Java, Python, TypeScript, Go, C#, Ruby, Kotlin, Rust, PHP, Perl, JSP, SQL) with safety validation and transactional rollback.

plugins.name: wicked-kanban
plugins.description: Persistent kanban board that survives across sessions. Auto-syncs Claude Code's TaskCreate/TaskUpdate to a durable board with git commit linking, task comments API, activity audit trail, and sprint grouping. Built-in tasks reset each session — kanban remembers everything.

plugins.name: wicked-crew
plugins.description: Workflow coordinator with quality gates for intent-driven software delivery. Orchestrates multi-phase projects with embedded QE gates, project archiving, and signal-based specialist routing.

plugins.name: wicked-jam
plugins.description: AI-powered brainstorming with dynamic focus groups. Generate diverse perspectives on ideas through persona-based discussion rounds.

plugins.name: wicked-data
plugins.description: Data engineering specialist for pipeline design, data analysis, ML guidance, and analytics architecture. Includes CSV/Excel analysis with DuckDB SQL querying.

plugins.name: wicked-startah
plugins.description: Opinionated starter kit with MCP servers and plugin recommendations for a productive Claude Code setup

plugins.name: wicked-workbench
plugins.description: Build-your-own dashboard for wicked-garden plugins using A2UI protocol. Combines components from kanban, memory, and other plugins into unified, AI-generated interfaces.

plugins.name: wicked-qe
plugins.description: Quality Engineering specialist for test strategy, scenario generation, test automation, and shift-left quality practices.

plugins.name: wicked-engineering
plugins.description: Engineering expertise with commands for planning, review, debugging, architecture, and docs. Includes senior engineers, architects, and technical writers.

plugins.name: wicked-product
plugins.description: Product and design expertise spanning requirements, UX, customer voice, and business strategy. Includes product managers, designers, researchers, and strategists.

plugins.name: wicked-platform
plugins.description: Platform engineering expertise spanning DevSecOps, observability, and compliance. Includes SREs, security engineers, compliance officers, and infrastructure specialists.

plugins.name: wicked-delivery
plugins.description: Delivery management expertise spanning PMO, experimentation, effort allocation, and risk monitoring. Includes delivery managers, cost analysts, rollout coordinators, and phase/signal effort breakdowns.

plugins.name: wicked-smaht
plugins.description: Ecosystem multiplier — automatically gathers context from installed plugins (memories, tasks, code search, brainstorms) before Claude responds. The more plugins you install, the smarter it gets. Confidence-based routing: fast path for simple queries, comprehensive assembly for complex ones.

plugins.name: wicked-agentic
plugins.description: Agentic architecture review, design guidance, and optimization for AI systems built with LLMs, agents, and workflows. Detects frameworks, analyzes agent topologies, scores patterns, and provides actionable recommendations.

plugins.name: wicked-scenarios
plugins.description: E2E testing via human and agent-readable markdown scenarios that orchestrate lightweight open-source CLI tools. Covers API, browser, performance, infrastructure, security, and accessibility testing with graceful degradation when tools are missing.
